1using System.Windows;
2using System.Windows.Controls;
3using System.Windows.Media;
4using Y.Negoci;
5
6namespace Y.Vista
7{
11 public partial class Login : Window
12 {
13 private bool placeholderUsername;
14 private bool placeholderPassword;
18 public Login()
19 {
20 InitializeComponent();
21 placeholderUsername = true;
22 placeholderPassword = true;
23 }
29 private void TxtBoxUser_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
30 {
31 if (placeholderUsername)
32 {
33 TxtBoxUser.Text = string.Empty;
34 TxtBoxUser.Foreground = Brushes.White;
35 placeholderUsername = false;
36 }
37 ComprovarButton();
38 }
44 private void TxtBoxUser_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
45 {
46 ComprovarButton();
47 if (TxtBoxUser.Text == string.Empty)
48 {
49 TxtBoxUser.Text = "Nom d'usuari";
50 TxtBoxUser.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
51 placeholderUsername = true;
52 }
53 }
59 private void PsswdLogIn_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
60 {
61 if (placeholderPassword)
62 {
63 PsswdLogIn.Password = string.Empty;
64 TxtBoxUser.Foreground = Brushes.White;
65 placeholderPassword = false;
66 }
67 ComprovarButton();
68 }
74 private void PsswdLogIn_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
75 {
76 ComprovarButton();
77 if (PsswdLogIn.Password == string.Empty)
78 {
79 PsswdLogIn.Password = "abcdef";
80 TxtBoxUser.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
81 placeholderPassword = true;
82 }
83 }
87 private void ComprovarButton()
88 {
89 if ((!placeholderPassword || placeholderUsername) && TxtBoxUser.Text != string.Empty && PsswdLogIn.Password != string.Empty)
90 {
91 BtnLogin.IsEnabled = true;
92 }
93 else BtnLogin.IsEnabled = false;
94 }
100 private void TextBlock_MouseLeftButtonUp(object sender, System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e)
101 {
102 Register register = new();
103 register.Show();
104 this.Close();
105 }
111 private void BtnLogin_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
112 {
113 UsuariModel u = new UsuariModel();
114 try
115 {
116 // comprovem si existeix l'usuari
117 UsuariNegoci uNegoci = new UsuariNegoci();
118 u = uNegoci.GetUsuari(TxtBoxUser.Text);
119 if (u.Contrasenya != PsswdLogIn.Password)
120 {
121 MessageBox.Show("Has introduït una contrasenya incorrecta");
122 }
123 else
124 {
125 MainWindow main = new MainWindow(u);
126 main.Show();
127 this.Close();
128 }
129 }
130 catch
131 {
132 MessageBox.Show("ERROR: Hi ha hagut un error en el procés de 'Log In'");
133 }
134 }
140 private void Escriure(object sender, System.Windows.Controls.TextChangedEventArgs e)
141 {
142 if (IsInitialized)
143 ComprovarButton();
144 }
150 private void PsswdLogIn_PasswordChanged(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
151 {
152 if (IsInitialized)
153 ComprovarButton();
154 }
155 }
156}
